import {ThemeCustom} from '@/components/Theme/Theme'; import createStyles from '@material-ui/core/styles/createStyles'; import withStyles, {WithStyles} from '@material-ui/core/styles/withStyles'; import React, {ComponentType, Fragment} from 'react'; import {compose} from 'recompose'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import GridContainer from '@/layouts/Grid/Container'; import Logo from '@/components/ToolBar/Logo'; interface IProps { classes?: any } const styles: any = (theme: ThemeCustom) => createStyles({ logoWestay: { width:'100%', marginTop:'25px', marginBottom:'40px', textAlign: 'center', }, }); // @ts-ignore const TermsOfConditions: ComponentType = (props: IProps) => { const {classes} = props; return (

iu khon s dng

Gii thiu

1. S mnh

Cho mng bn n vi WeStay!

 

WeStay l sn giao dch thng mi in t trc truyn c to ra nhm cung cp thng tin ca nhng cn h cho thu ngn hn ti nhng ngi ang tm kim chng.


2. Mi quan h gia WeStay v ngi dng

Cc t chc, hay c nhn , ang v s tham gia giao dch trn sn giao dch thng mi in t WeStay, s sn sng tham gia giao dch vi mt thi tn trng quyn v li ch ca nhau, mt cch hp php nh c cc hp ng v khng tri vi cc quy nh ca php lut.

- Chng ti cung cp thng tin ti cc bi ng trn Website vi mc ch h tr kt ni Khch hng (mun thu nh) v Ch nh (mun cho thu nh).

- Cc thng tin c ng trn WeStay cn phi c tun th theo tt c cc lut p dng (nu c), khng ng nhng thng tin hoc sn phm b cm bi php lut.

- Chng ti cng hot ng nh mt knh giao tip gia Ch nh v Khch hng c th gii quyt bt k tranh chp no gia hai bn.

- Vic s dng Website v dch v trn Website cn phi c thc hin mt cch cng khai v minh bch m bo quyn li v s an ton ca cc bn.


II. Quy trnh giao dch

Quy trnh dnh cho Khch hng

Website WeStay c thit k c th h tr mt cch y v thun tin nht cho ngi s dng.


Qu trnh ng k ti khon:

- in email v t mt khu cho ti khon.

- Kch hot ti khon thng qua email (bn s nhn c email kch hot ti khon ngay sau khi ng k).

- ng nhp, vo Thng tin c nhn, cp nht cc thng tin:

+ Gii tnh

+ H tn

+ S in thoi

+ Email

+ Ngy sinh

+ Cc thng tin khng bt buc khc (nh a ch, m t bn thn,..)

Cc thng tin c nhn ca bn s c bo mt cn thn.


Qu trnh thc hin giao dch:

Khi Khch hng mun thu bt k mt cn h no c ng trn trang web, c mt vi lu nh sau:

- Tm kim cn h ph hp nht trn trang web, sau cn thn a ra quyt nh cui cng.

- Sau khi tm thy mt cn homestay thch hp, bn c th t phng trc tip trn Westay.org hoc gi in cho b phn chm sc khch hng (bng s hotline) t qua in thoi. Thng tin c ghi trn Website.

- Bn s phi hon thnh th tc thanh ton ngay trong qu trnh t phng c th nhn c email xc nhn t phng t WeStay.

- Chng ti yu cu tt c cc i tc ca chng ti, cc ch s hu cn h, cung cp thng tin mt cch y , chnh xc, chi tit v trung thc v cn h ca mnh.

- Tt c cc hnh vi la o, gian ln, la o trong qu trnh giao dch s b ln n v phi chu hon ton trch nhim theo php lut.


WeStay s m bo:

- Thng tin v gi c do Ch nh t ra l ton vn, khng b chnh sa bi WeStay khi cha c Ch nh ng .

- Thng tin v cht lng v tiu chun ca cn h ng vi m t ti thi im Ch nh ng bi trn Website.

Trong trng hp khch hng ca WeStay by t s khng hi lng i vi dch v, chng ti s thng tin li vi Ch nh :

- Nng cp cc cn h v cung cp dch v tt hn.

- Cung cp gi dch v min ph khc (nu c th).

- Gi cc a im thay th m cht lng cn h v dch v ngang bng c khi tt hn (nu c th).

- Trong trng hp xu nht, chng ti s xem xt yu cu Ch nh hon tr tin cho qu khch.


2. Qu trnh ng tin ca Ch nh

Ch nh c quyn ng cc thng tin trc tip ln trang homestay ca mnh. Tuy nhin, nu nh WeStay pht hin ra cc thng tin sai s tht, Ch nh buc phi g v chnh sa cc thng tin . ng thi, Ch nh khng th t xa cc nh gi ca Khch hng. Nu thc s cn xa/ chnh sa cc nh gi ny, Ch nh cn lin h vi WeStay v a ra cc l do hp l.


3. m bo an ton giao dch

Cam kt:

thc hin cc giao dch thnh cng, hn ch ti a cc ri ro c th pht sinh, ngi dng WeStay khng nn cung cp thng tin chi tit v cc khon thanh ton cho bt k ai bng e-mail. Chng ti khng chu trch nhim cho bt k tn tht no (l kt qu ca s trao i thng tin qua internet hoc e-mail) gy ra bi ngi dng.


C ch:

C ch chng ti s dng m bo cc giao dch nh sau:

- Qun l thnh vin: thnh vin ca WeStay.com phi cung cp y cc thng tin c lin quan v chu trch nhim v tnh xc thc ca nhng thng tin ny. Chng ti s ghi li tt c cc thng tin c nhn v tnh trng php l ca bn cho mc ch qun l. Chng ti s cp nht thng tin thng xuyn ng thi to ra nhng nh gi da trn cc thng tin ny.

- Chng ti cng nh gi ch nh qua nhng ln nhn xt, phn hi v kin ca khch hng

- Chng ti s n lc ht sc gii quyt bt k khiu ni v tranh chp c th pht sinh. Quyn li ca bn s c bo v bi chng ti hoc s can thip ca cc c quan chnh quyn a phng.


III. Quy trnh thanh ton

1. i vi Khch hng

Cho ti thi im hin ti, WeStay cung cp 3 hnh thc thanh ton nh sau gip giao dch ca khch hng vi chng ti tr nn thun tin nht.

- S dng th tn dng Visa/ Master Card hoc th ATM ni a.

- Chuyn khon ti STK ca WeStay (ngn hng Vietcombank hoc Techcombank).

Lu : Vic thanh ton cn c thc hin ngay trong qu trnh t phng, sau bn mi nhn c email xc nhn t phng t WeStay.


2. i vi Ch nh

Sau khi khch hng check-out, chng ti s chuyn phn ph t phng cho Ch nh ( khu tr i ph hoa hng c nhn theo tha thun) sau 1-2 ngy.


IV. Chnh sch hy v chuyn nhng

1. Chnh sch hy

WeStay cho php cc Ch nh la chn mt trong s cc chnh sch hy phng tiu chun: Linh hot, Nghim ngt, Ring m chng ti s thc hin, bo v quyn li ca khch v ch nh. Ti mi trang homestay trn WeStay, chng ti s nu r chnh sch hy khch hng c th cp nht.


Chnh sch Linh hot: Min ph hy phng khi hy 5 ngy trc khi nhn phng.

Tng chi ph t phng s c hon li 100% nu khch hng hy n t phng trc 5 ngy so vi ngy n nhn phng. Khch hng khng c hon tin trong vng 5 ngy trc ngy nhn phng.

Nu khch hy n t phng trong vng 5 ngy trc ngy nhn phng, khch buc phi chu 100% s tin thanh ton, khng c hon tr.

V d: Khch hng c n t phng gi tr 500.000, check-in vo ngy 14/02/2019, khch hng s c hon li 500.000 khi hy phng mun nht trc 23:59 ngy 08/02/2019. Bt u t 00:00 ngy 09/02, khch hng s khng c hon li khon tin no.


Chnh sch Nghim ngt: Hon li 50% gi tr n t phng khi khch hy 5 ngy trc khi nhn phng.

50% chi ph t phng s c hon li, nu khch hng hy n t phng mun nht trc 5 ngy so vi ngy n nhn phng. Khch hng khng c hon tin trong vng 7 ngy trc ngy nhn phng.

Nu khch hy n t phng trong vng 5 ngy trc ngy nhn phng, khch buc phi chu 100% s tin thanh ton, khng c hon tr.

V d: Khch hng c n t phng gi tr 500.000, check-in vo ngy 14/02/2019, khch hng s c hon li 250.000 khi hy phng mun nht trc 23:59 ngy 08/02/2019. Bt u t 00:00 ngy 09/02, khch hng s khng c hon li khon tin no.


Chnh sch Ring ca Ch nh:

Ch nh t ng ti v la chn chnh sch hy ring v phi c nim yt, cng b cng khai v chnh sch hy ng ti trn WeStay.


2. Chnh sch chuyn nhng

Khch hng t phng thnh cng nu khng cn nhu cu s dng n hng c quyn chuyn nhng li cho bn th ba.

Giao dch chuyn nhng ny phi chu chi ph giao dch tng t mt giao dch t phng bnh thng trn WeStay.

Bn Chuyn Nhng li c trch nhim thng bo cho WeStay v Ch Nh v vic thc hin giao dch ny hon thin cc th tc cn thit theo quy nh ca WeStay.


V. Bo v thng tin khch hng

1. Mc ch v phm vi thc hin

Chng ti thu thp thng tin ca bn vi mc ch duy nht l qun l ti khon ca bn, ng k ti khon, lin lc khi c tranh chp xy ra, cung cp cho cc i tc ca chng ti thng tin ca bn nu cn thit. Chng ti cam kt khng bn, chia s hoc trao i thng tin c nhn ca bn.

Cc loi thng tin m chng ti thu thp l: tn, a ch, s in thoi, email.


2. Vic s dng thng tin

Cc thng tin ca ngi dng WeStay s c s dng v ch c s dng cho mc ch kim sot, qun l hot ng ca cc thnh vin v to thun li cho vic thc hin giao dch.


3. Thi gian lu tr thng tin

Thng tin ca ngi dng s c lu tr t 02 cho n 10 nm. Ngoi tr nhng trng hp ngi dng t xa b ti khon hoc thng tin c nhn.

a ch b phn qun l thng tin khch hng

Cng ty C phn WeStay

a ch: Tng 3, H Thnh Plaza, s 102 Thi Thnh, ng a, H Ni

in thoi: 0916 374 057

Email: info@westay.org


4. Chnh sa thng tin c nhn

Ch nh v Khch hng c th chnh sa thng tin c nhn ca mnh trong mc ti khon trn trang web.


5. Cam kt bo mt thng tin Khch hng

Chng ti cam kt thng tin ca bn s c bo mt tuyt i, theo chnh sch bo mt thng tin ca WeStay. Vic thu thp v s dng thng tin cho mi ngi dng ch c thc hin khi c s ng ca ngi dng , tr trng hp b quy nh bi php lut. Ngi dng c quyn kim tra, cp nht, iu chnh hoc hy b thng tin c nhn ca mnh theo ng quy trnh ca chng ti. Chng ti s khng tit l thng tin c nhn ca bn cho bt k bn th ba no hoc s dng thng tin bn ngoi trang web, ngoi tr nhng trng hp sau y:

- Vic cung cp thng tin c nhn cho cc bn th ba c s ng ca ngi dng.

- Bn th ba l nhng bn c thu bi WeStay qun l my ch, pht trin website v h tr qu trnh thanh ton. Trong trng hp ny, hp ng gia WeStay v cc bn th ba phi xc nh r trch nhim ca mi bn trong vic bo v thng tin ngi dng, khng chia s thng tin vi bt c ai v ch bn th ba s dng thng tin ca cc ngi dng thc hin nhim v ca mnh. Nu h thng ca chng ti xy ra li v lm mt thng tin c nhn ca ngi dng, chng ti s trin khai sa cha v cc bn th ba ca chng ti s thng bo cho cc c quan chnh ph c thm quyn trong vng 24 gi sau khi vn c pht hin ra. Theo yu cu ca cc c quan chnh ph hp php, tt c cc hnh vi c tit l thng tin khch hng hoc lm sai thng tin khch hng u ng b khin trch v x l. Nu bn c bt k khiu ni g v vn nhng thng tin ca mnh c s dng khng ng v chnh xc, chng ti s c c ch xc minh nht nh v x l ph hp, hoc nu cn thit, chng ti s yu cu s can thip ca chnh ph.


VI. Gii quyt tranh chp

1. Cc bc gii quyt tranh chp:

Bc 1: Sau khi nhn c bt k khiu ni v dch v qua email hoc tng i chm sc khch hng, chng ti s lin lc vi cc ch nh v yu cu s gii thch r rng sau cung cp y chi tit lin h gii quyt cc tranh chp. WeStay sn sng tr thnh cu ni giao tip gia ch nh v khch thu nh. Chng ti khuyn khch khch hng gii quyt cc tranh chp trn c s ha bnh v thng lng. Cc bn c trch nhim cp nht tnh hnh cho WeStay chng ti xc thc v gii quyt vn mt cch nhanh chng nht.

Bc 2: Nu sau 3 ngy chng ti khng th lin lc c vi ch nh, hoc ngi c lin quan ti tranh chp, hoc lin lc nhng b t chi, khng ch ng gii quyt cc vn th hp ng k kt gia ch nh v WeStay s b chm dt hon ton ngay lp tc.

Bc 3: Ngi khiu ni cng c quyn a v tranh chp ln cho cc c quan chnh quyn a phng c thm quyn gii quyt. Chng ti s h tr y cho ngi khiu ni v cung cp tt c cc thng tin cn thit gii quyt vn khi c yu cu.


2. Khch hng gi khiu ni ti a ch:

Cng ty C phn WeStay

a ch: Tng 3, H Thnh Plaza, s 102 Thi Thnh, ng a, H Ni

in thoi: 0916 374 057

Email: info@westay.org

Thi gian tip nhn v x l phn nh l 3 (ba) ngy lm vic k t thi im WeStay nhn c phn nh t pha khch hng.


3. Trch nhim ca cc bn lin quan:

- WeStay tn trng v nghim tc thc hin cc quy nh ca php lut v bo v quyn li ca khch hng. V vy, ngh khch hng v ch nh cung cp y , chnh xc, trung thc v chi tit cc thng tin lin quan n dch v. Mi hnh vi la o, gian ln trong kinh doanh u b ln n v phi chu hon ton trch nhim trc php lut.

- Cc bn bao gm khch hng v ch nh s phi c vai tr trch nhim trong vic tch cc gii quyt vn . Ch nh cn c trch nhim cung cp vn bn giy t chng thc thng tin lin quan n s vic ang gy mu thun cho khch hng. WeStay s c trch nhim cung cp nhng thng tin lin quan n khch hng v ch nh nu c ch nh hoc khch hng (lin quan n tranh chp ) yu cu. Sau khi ch nh v khch hng gii quyt xong tranh chp phi c trch nhim bo li cho ban qun tr WeStay. Trong trng hp giao dch pht sinh mu thun m li thuc v ch nh:

+ WeStay s c bin php cnh co, kha ti khon hoc chuyn cho c quan php lut c thm quyn ty theo mc ca sai phm. WeStay s chm dt v g b ton b tin bi v cn h ca ch nh trn website, ng thi yu cu ch nh bi hon cho khch hng tha ng trn c s tha thun vi khch hng.

+ Nu thng qua hnh thc tha thun m vn khng th gii quyt c mu thun pht sinh t giao dch gia 2 bn ch nh v khch hng, th mt trong 2 bn ch nh v khch hng s c quyn nh n c quan php lut c thm quyn can thip nhm m bo li ch hp php ca cc bn, nht l cho khch hng.

); }; export default compose( withStyles(styles), )(TermsOfConditions);
